snippet.textDisplay: My only complaint so far is that they changed Heidegger from a short fat guy in green with a black beard into basically Jett from cowboy bebop - a towering male model. Everyone looks like models. Other than that my wallet is ready.
snippet.textOriginal: My only complaint so far is that they changed Heidegger from a short fat guy in green with a black beard into basically Jett from cowboy bebop - a towering male model. Everyone looks like models. Other than that my wallet is ready.
